<S%G5124>This<s%> was <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5151>thrice:<s%> and the <S%G4632>vessel<s%> was <S%G353>received<s%> up <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> I to you <S%G369>without<s%> <S%G369>gainsaying,<s%> as soon as I was <S%G3343>sent<s%> for: I <S%G4441>ask<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> for <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3056>intent<s%> you have <S%G3343>sent<s%> for me?

But in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> he that <S%G5399>fears<s%> him, and <S%G2038>works<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> is <S%G1184>accepted<s%> with him.

The <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> God <S%G649>sent<s%> to the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> (he is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3956>all:<s%>)
